description: This file defines a React functional component named Chessboard that renders a chessboard UI, manages keyboard navigation, ARIA accessibility features, and interactivity for selecting and moving pieces. It also includes internal helpers for board rendering and state handling.

methods.name: fenToBoard
methods.description: Converts a FEN string into a two-dimensional array representing the chessboard layout.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard navigation and actions on individual board squares.

methods.name: renderSquare
methods.description: Renders a single square of the chessboard as a button with appropriate accessibility attributes and styles.
